text: Chandpur Court Railway Station is a railway station of Chandpur Sadar sub- district of Chandpur, Bangladesh. == History == On July 1, 1895, the then Assam Bengal Railway constructed a 69 km long railway line from Laksham of Comilla District to Chandpur. During that time, Chandpur Court Railway Station was constructed. == Train stoppage == Three trains stop at Chandpur court railway station: # Chandpur Commuter # Meghna Express # Sagarika Express == See also == * Chandpur Railway Station * Moishadi Railway Station == References == Category:Railway stations in Chandpur District
title: Chandpur Court Railway Station
